name: Get To Work (eclipseditchy)
description:
Get To Work is a short project I made to practice and develop my skills in 3D modelling and game design. The goal of the game is to get from the elevator to the highlighted desk with your computer. The game is a surreal take on a standard office environment and includes some horror elements that may be disturbing to some individuals. 

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Mouse drag - Look around
E - Interact with your computer and other objects around the room. (It's supposed to prompt you when, but it seems not all browsers may display that)

I hope this short experience can be interesting!
Thanks for playing!
